Sentencas: This work investigates the importance of the chemical composition and porosity of the coating on reducing the oxidation and Cr-evaporation rate of AISI 430 steel in O-2-5%H2O at 800 ?
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) interconnect applications.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: Electrophoretic deposition (EPD) is used to deposit eight different coatings.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: Mn1.25-0.5xCo1.75-0.5xMxO4 (M = Fe, Cu, and Fe-Cu; and X = 0 and 0.3) powders are synthesized by the glycine nitrate process (GNP) and applied as spinel (without La2O3) or composite (with La2O3) coatings.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: The coatings initially show porous structure, and the coating density improvement depends on coating composition.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: The coating porosity for composite co-doped Fe-Cu MnCo spinel (MCFeCuL) is 28% less than MnCo spinel (MC) after 504 h. All coated samples show lower oxidation and Cr-evaporation rates than uncoated samples.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: The parabolic oxidation rates are lower for composite coated than the spinel ones, possibly due to the formation of LaCrO3 reducing Cr outward diffusion.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: Composite MnCo-La2O3 (MCL) shows the lowest oxidation rate.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: In contrast, coating effectiveness in reducing Cr-evaporation depends on coating density.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: Cu-doped coatings show less coating porosity with better oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior than Fe-doped coatings.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: All coated samples form a densified layer at the thermally grown oxide (TGO) scale/coating interface, playing a crucial role in oxidation resistance and migration of Cr from the TGO scale to the coating.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: The changes in Cr-evaporation fluxes depending on coating porosity and pore size are calculated and compared with Cr-loss rate measurements.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: Among the coatings, composite Cu-doped MnCo spinel (MCCuL) and MCFeCuL show better performance than the other ones.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel

Sentencas: This study shows that it is possible to decrease coating porosity and improve the performance of MnCo spinel coatings against corrosion and Cr-evaporation without two-step sintering (at T <= 900 degrees C) procedures.
Titulo: Oxidation and Cr-evaporation behavior of MnCo based spinel and composite coated AISI 430 steel
